title: Remembering Occupy
content: Rear positioned, with police, we bring food tent supplies to Cascadia Pioneers statue.  Beach head established, full sized tent by evening.  Good relations with police got us off on the right foot.  Polarizations would happen later, in predictable ways.  Portland got [some better bathrooms](http://mybizmo.blogspot.com/2011/11/endgame.html).
author: Kirby Urner
